mapper.select: SELECT apprelmnt_no , apprline_no , user_name , appr_result , appr_reason , appr_date , team_name , department_name FROM appr_elmnt JOIN employee ON appr_elmnt.approver=employee.user_no LEFT JOIN team ON employee.team_no=team.team_no LEFT JOIN department ON appr_elmnt.dept_no=department.department_id
